Uses of Class
framework.Implementation

  • Packages that use Implementation 
    Package Description
    externalInformationPort
    ExternalInformationPort component - Used for (UDP-)Information (for example a public key) exchange with "external" communication partners (for example other mixes or clients).
    framework
    The package framework introduces all parts of the mix and the overall framework, which are not exchanged.
    inputOutputHandler
    InputOutputHandler component - Handles (mix) message-based connections (see package Message) with communication partners (clients, other mixes and proxy servers) and therefore abstracts from the physical communication channels.
    keyGenerator
    KeyGenerator component - Used to generate cryptographic keys
    messageProcessor
    MessageProcessor component - Takes messages from component InputOutputHandler, processes them (recoding, checking for replays, removing/adding padding, initiating message authentication) and bypasses them to component OutputStrategy.
    networkClock
    Network Clock component - Provides a clock, which could be synchronized with an SNTP server.
    outputStrategy
    Output Strategy component - Collects messages until an output criterion is fulfilled (certain number of messages collected or timeout reached)
    userDatabase
    User Database component - Used to store user-specific data (for example identifiers, session keys or buffers)

    • Uses of Implementation in externalInformationPort

      Subclasses of Implementation in externalInformationPort 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BasicExternalInformationPort
      Basic implementation of component ExternalInformationPort.

    • Uses of Implementation in framework

      Fields in framework declared as Implementation 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Implementation Controller.implementation 
      Fields in framework with type parameters of type Implementation 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Vector<Implementation> Mix.implementations
      stores all components' Implementations
      Methods in framework that return Implementation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Implementation Controller.getImplementation() 
      Implementation[] Mix.getImplementations()
      all implementations, that belong to this mix
      static Implementation LocalClassLoader.instantiateImplementation(String className, String packageName)
      This method instantiates an implementation specified by a class name and a package name.
      Methods in framework with parameters of type Implementation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void Mix.registerImplementation(Implementation implementationToRegister)
      Also the implementations should be registered with the mix, to be accessible by all components.
      void Controller.setImplementation(Implementation implementation)
